name: Build-A-Widget
description:
Quickly prototype a widget with this Build-A-Widget widget!


To use this widget, either select:

  1. Edit Source: This will open an iframe that allows you to edit the rendered widget
  2. Codeblock -> Widget: This will prompt you to select a codeblock which should contain Widget JSX code you wish to render. While the widget is still running, you can edit the selected codeblock to see the updates reflected in real-time.
